addNewDisputeKit(address,uint256).details: Add a new supported dispute kit module to the court.

params._disputeKitAddress: The address of the dispute kit contract.
params._parent: The ID of the parent dispute kit. It is left empty when root DK is created.  Note that the root DK must be supported by the general court.

appeal(uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Appeals the ruling of a specified dispute.  Note: Access restricted to the Dispute Kit for this `disputeID`.

params._extraData: Extradata for the dispute. Can be required during court jump.
params._numberOfChoices: Number of choices for the dispute. Can be required during court jump.

appealCost(uint256).details: Gets the cost of appealing a specified dispute.

appealPeriod(uint256).details: Gets the start and the end of a specified dispute's current appeal period.

returns.end: The end of the appeal period.
returns.start: The start of the appeal period.

arbitrationCost(bytes).details: Gets the cost of arbitration in a specified subcourt.

params._extraData: Additional info about the dispute. We use it to pass the ID of the subcourt to create the dispute in (first 32 bytes)  and the minimum number of jurors required (next 32 bytes).

params._governor: The new value for the `governor` storage variable.

changeHiddenVotes(uint96,bool).details: Changes the `hiddenVotes` property value of a specified subcourt.

params._hiddenVotes: The new value for the `hiddenVotes` property value.

params._jurorProsecutionModule: The new value for the `jurorProsecutionModule` storage variable.

params._maxFreezingTime: The new value for the `maxFreezingTime` storage variable.

params._minStakingTime: The new value for the `minStakingTime` storage variable.

params._pinakion: The new value for the `pinakion` storage variable.

changeSubcourtAlpha(uint96,uint256).details: Changes the `alpha` property value of a specified subcourt.

params._alpha: The new value for the `alpha` property value.

changeSubcourtJurorFee(uint96,uint256).details: Changes the `feeForJuror` property value of a specified subcourt.

params._feeForJuror: The new value for the `feeForJuror` property value.

changeSubcourtJurorsForJump(uint96,uint2.details: Changes the `jurorsForCourtJump` property value of a specified subcourt.

params._jurorsForCourtJump: The new value for the `jurorsForCourtJump` property value.

changeSubcourtMinStake(uint96,uint256).details: Changes the `minStake` property value of a specified subcourt. Don't set to a value lower than its parent's `minStake` property value.

params._minStake: The new value for the `minStake` property value.

changeSubcourtTimesPerPeriod(uint96,uint.details: Changes the `timesPerPeriod` property value of a specified subcourt.

params._timesPerPeriod: The new value for the `timesPerPeriod` property value.

params._courtParameters: Numeric parameters of General court (minStake, alpha, feeForJuror and jurorsForCourtJump respectively).
params._disputeKit: The address of the default dispute kit.
params._hiddenVotes: The `hiddenVotes` property value of the general court.
params._jurorProsecutionModule: The address of the juror prosecution module.
params._pinakion: The address of the token contract.
params._sortitionSumTreeK: The number of children per node of the general court's sortition sum tree.
params._timesPerPeriod: The `timesPerPeriod` property value of the general court.

createDispute(uint256,bytes).details: Creates a dispute. Must be called by the arbitrable contract.

params._extraData: Additional info about the dispute. We use it to pass the ID of the dispute's subcourt (first 32 bytes),  the minimum number of jurors required (next 32 bytes) and the ID of the specific dispute kit (last 32 bytes).
params._numberOfChoices: Number of choices for the jurors to choose from.

returns.disputeID: The ID of the created dispute.

createSubcourt(uint96,bool,uint256,uint2.details: Creates a subcourt under a specified parent court.

params._alpha: The `alpha` property value of the subcourt.
params._feeForJuror: The `feeForJuror` property value of the subcourt.
params._hiddenVotes: The `hiddenVotes` property value of the subcourt.
params._jurorsForCourtJump: The `jurorsForCourtJump` property value of the subcourt.
params._minStake: The `minStake` property value of the subcourt.
params._parent: The `parent` property value of the subcourt.
params._sortitionSumTreeK: The number of children per node of the subcourt's sortition sum tree.
params._supportedDisputeKits: Indexes of dispute kits that this subcourt will support.
params._timesPerPeriod: The `timesPerPeriod` property value of the subcourt.

currentRuling(uint256).details: Gets the current ruling of a specified dispute.

draw(uint256,uint256).details: Draws jurors for the dispute. Can be called in parts.

params._iterations: The number of iterations to run.

enableDisputeKits(uint96,uint256[],bool).details: Adds/removes court's support for specified dispute kits.

params._disputeKitIDs: The IDs of dispute kits which support should be added/removed.
params._enable: Whether add or remove the dispute kits from the subcourt.

execute(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Distribute tokens and ETH for the specific round of the dispute. Can be called in parts.

params._iterations: The number of iterations to run.
The number of delayed stakes to execute.

executeGovernorProposal(address,uint256,.details: Allows the governor to call anything on behalf of the contract.

params._amount: The value sent with the call.
params._data: The data sent with the call.

executeRuling(uint256).details: Executes a specified dispute's ruling. UNTRUSTED.

getDisputeKitChildren(uint256).details: Gets non-primitive properties of a specified dispute kit node.

params._disputeKitID: The ID of the dispute kit.

returns._0: children Indexes of children of this DK.

getTimesPerPeriod(uint96).details: Gets the timesPerPeriod array for a given court.

params._subcourtID: The ID of the court to get the times from.

returns.timesPerPeriod: The timesPerPeriod array for the given court.

isDisputeKitJumping(uint256).details: Returns true if the dispute kit will be switched to a parent DK.

returns._0: Whether DK will be switched or not.

passPeriod(uint256).details: Passes the period of a specified dispute.

passPhase().details: Switches the phases between Staking and Freezing, also signal the switch to the dispute kits.

setStake(uint96,uint256).details: Sets the caller's stake in a subcourt.

devdoc.title: KlerosCore  Core arbitrator contract for Kleros v2.  Note that this contract trusts the token and the dispute kit contracts.
